entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose AVX512BW, AVX512CD, and AVX512DQ #76579
    8.0.0
  • Bound checks for static readonly arrays #76578
    8.0.0
  • Dispose on singleton services is not called automatically by DI Container #76568
  • Assertion failed 'child->OperIs(GT_AND) || child->OperIsCmpCompare()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #76566
    8.0.0
  • Tar: filesizes >= 8Gb are truncated on extraction due to incorrect size being written #76563
    8.0.0
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting consistent naming for permit count #76557
  • Configuring Console Logging FormatterOptions doesn't work without setting FormatterName #76556
  • ContainBlockStoreAddress on arm64 can remove handles #76552
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'src->OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR, GT_LCL_FLD, GT_FIELD, GT_IND, GT_OBJ, GT_CALL, GT_MKREFANY, GT_RET_EXPR, GT_COMMA, GT_CNS_VEC) || ((src->TypeGet() != TYP_STRUCT) && src->OperIsSIMD())' #76550
    8.0.0
  • Consider clearing JsonSerializerOptions.Caching cache using a timer, not just based on incoming calls #76548
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_40607\\Runtime_40607\\Runtime_40607.cmd #76546
    8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] `CompilerServer: fatal error - server reports different hash version than build task` on `linux-musl` when using mono-backed runtime #76543
  • System.AccessViolationException thrown by PrintDocument.Print when platform is X86 #76538
    7.0.0
  • Static JsonTypeInfo properties in source generated JsonSerializerContext instances are mutable #76535
    7.0.0
  • Support running perf benchmarks from `dotnet/performance` on a PR, and compare with a baseline #76533
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #76529
  • DebuggerTests.SetVariableValueTests.DebuggerTests.SetVariableValueTests.SetLocalPrimitiveTypeVariableOutOfRange - Browser not ready #76528
  • JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull doesn't play well with required nullable properties #76527
    8.0.0
  • JIT: 'X <= uint.MaxValue' to 'X >> 32' #76525
    Future
  • `System.InsufficientExecutionStackException` when using Mono on `linux-musl` #76523
  • Optimize CheckSample #76520
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Personalized ICU is not being used by CultureInfo #76570
  • Incompatible with .NET Framework 4.8.1 runtime. Loading the wrong DLL. #76518
  • Test failure: access violation in cpblk tests #76506
    8.0.0
  • Tar: Not able to write a PaxTarEntry from a TarReader. #75215
    7.0.0
  • Add more granular pipelines for mobile configurations #75002
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][interop] Roundtrip identical instance: delegate<->function, task<->promise #56963
    Future
  • ILASM roundtrip failure - `src/tests/readytorun/tests/mainv2` #73954
    8.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\tests\\mainv1\\mainv1.cmd #73138
    8.0.0
  • superpmi-diffs failures/timeouts #76542
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_34937\\Runtime_34937\\Runtime_34937.cmd #76159
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_34937/Runtime_34937/Runtime_34937.sh #76158
    8.0.0
  • FileCheck error: '__jit_disasm.out' is empty for outerloop tests #76150
    8.0.0
  • FileCheck error: '__jit_disasm.out' is empty. #76352
    8.0.0
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #2036
    Future
  • CustomConstantAttribute doesn't work in Mono #49806
    8.0.0
  • Reconsider .Net 7 build environment to support mainstream Arm64 distros #76195
  • Assertion failed '!"Qmarks beyond morph disallowed."' #76509
    8.0.0
  • In Xamarin Forms, NetInterface.NetworkInterfaceType always return a value of 0 on Android. #76493
    7.0.x
  • [Android] NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces failed with NetworkInformationException (message: Success) #75809
    7.0.x
  • Add descriptions to WebAssembly Browser and Console App templates #75741
    7.0.x
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.InteropServices.Javascript #74734
    7.0.0
  • [android] `unknown opcode name for 400`, only workaround is UseInterpreter=true #76192
    7.0.x
  • WASM: GL object no longer accessible in .net 7 (Skiasharp) #76077
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Test and fix using AesCcm after disposal with OpenSSL #76577
    area-System.Security
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update net6.0 Maui nuget.config link #76576
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • AOT Runtime.Base: Change AttributeTargets and AttributeUsageAttribute to public #76573
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove all uses of `SString::Printf()` accepting `WCHAR` #76571
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix Interop.Gdi32.StartDoc p/invoke #76569
    area-System.Drawing
  • Add readmes to reflection #76567
    documentation, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][Android] Backport fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #76565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Reduce some allocations when emitting CFI code #76562
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove macOS exception for building crossgen2 with NativeAOT #76561
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Enable smoke tests on macOS #76560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DateTime: Use Optimised Equals Implementation in object.Equals() #76559
    community-contribution
  • Rename request count to permit count on System.Threading.RateLimiting #76558
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update Crst lock levels #76553
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Do not produce full-width local field stores for normalize-on-store locals #76549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Ensure NI_Vector128_AsVector128 (aka `Vector128<T> AsVector128(this Vector<T> value)`) doesn't have a side-effect in its assert #76547
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add `JsonEncodedText.Value` #76545
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure source generated metadata properties are read-only. #76540
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Implement next part of PackedSimd class #76539
    new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Streamline root commands and cli helpers #76537
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] [Experiment] Try to return MSBuild Server back. #76536
  • [release/7.0] [mono][sgen] Update memory load information after world is resumed #76534
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add tests for customizing source-gen contracts #76531
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Backport consolidation of Newtonsoft versions #76522
    area-Meta, 6.0.x
  • Add GenTreeID in allocating registers table #76521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Split runtime-extra-platforms into distinct pipelines #76328
  • Improve performance of FormattingHelper.CountDigits(uint) #76519
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Remove encoding allocations for System.Security.Xml #76364
    area-System.Security
  • Tar: Use indexer setter instead of Add on ExtendedAttributes dictionary #76404
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests improvements #76381
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Updating Vector256 to have its software fallback be 2x Vector128<T> ops #76221
    area-System.Numerics
  • update arm32 test queues for msquic #76267
    arch-arm32, area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-linux, test-enhancement
  • Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76459
    area-Meta
  • [PERF] Update perf_slow scheduled micro_mono run queue #76564
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Android] Fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces on API 21-23 #76541
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • SPMI: Avoid division by zero #76544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Ensure no overflow in ContainBlockStoreAddress #76532
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Pass local runtime timestamp from git into ci_setup #76396
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Align parameter default value resolution between coreCLR, Mono and NativeAOT runtimes #75612
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • JIT: don't forward sub qmarks to LCL_FLD assignments #76524
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #76497
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #76370
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [mono][sgen] Update memory load information after world is resumed #76400
    area-GC-mono
  • Ensure NI_Vector256_GetLower has the right simdSize and improve codegen slightly #76456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] add missing API xml doc #76196
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][arm] Fix rethrow instruction size #76387
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use System.CommandLine (v2) in dotnet-pgo #76467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce OrderBy overheads for default comparer #76418
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessarily zipping tests #76580
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76471
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta
  • fix lower heap hard limit condition for regions #76407
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use AzDO Pipeline Resources to define our build Docker containers #75473
    area-Infrastructure
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • System.Private.Xml AOT compatibility fixes #76473
    area-System.Xml, linkable-framework
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] backport Tar fixes #76322
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Add portable linux source build leg #75546
  • Obsolete `RSA.EncryptValue` and `RSA.DecryptValue` #76514
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • GC: Fix CheckPromoted for frozen objects #76251
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Clean up JIT<->EE "get class name" methods, support nested classes in method sets #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Some SIMD-related cleanup #73819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix thread-safety of JsonDocument.GetString/TextEquals #76450
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [WIP] HttpStress do not use SYS_PTRACE cap for docker runs #76307
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fixing where `ClearContained` is called for certain Arm64 cast ops #76517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #76481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement AES-GCM with CryptoKit on macOS #76490
    area-System.Security
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [mono] Remove unused signature variable #76465
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #75643
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Allow for null XmlSerializers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #75638
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix binary serialization of DateTime with DCS and add test. #75650
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Change LibrariesConfiguration defaults in tests #75033
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #75637
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Do not transform SIMD field access into HWIs in minopts, always fold local indirs to `LCL_FLD` #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • block port# 5060 and 5061 #76485
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: Smarter ordering of late args based on register uses #76017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LinuxBionic] Disable RemoteExecutor during test runs #76495
  • Simplify type info resolver assignment #76275
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccExtraExportedRuntimeMethods MSBuild property #76455
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Green Threads] PInvokes do not swap to the OS stack #2018
  • [Green Threads] FCalls do not swap to the OS stack #2017
  • [Green Threads] - Integration into Task.Wait is probably wrong in various ways. #2016
  • [Green Threads] JIT does not generate the new prolog #2015
  • [Green Threads] Unique managed thread objects/ids are not implemented #2014
  • [Green Threads] PInvokes to non-green-thread safe apis do not trigger thread pinning, and so can result in incorrect behavior #2013
  • [Green Threads] ThreadStatics are not integrated #2012
  • [Green Threads] GC tracking in suspended threads is not enabled. If a GC occurs, there will be heap corruption #2011
  • [Green Threads] - GC stackwalking with multiple stack segments #2010

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: RhUnbox2 changes to a ret void in release configuration #2008

PullRequests

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Allow cast from i1 to i8 #2006
  • Initial green thread prototype #2002

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: support FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Add support for GT_STORE_BLK #2005

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APICompat.Task targets file should be validated in CI #28300

Closed

  • Missing "No templates found matching:..."-message when using `-minimal` option with `dotnet new` #23782

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch to 7.0.2xx for loc build #28304
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28303
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix msbuild evaluation of ApiCompat task pkg #28301
    Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • apicompat: attribute changed on right must only be emitted in strict mode #28290
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28270
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2010561 #27667
  • [dotnet-new] Add inRoot option for AddProjectsToSolutionPostAction #28295

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • InterpolatedStringHandler limitation #6507

Updated

  • Proposal: File scoped namespaces #137
    10.0
  • Champion "permit methods in enum declarations" #297
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unnecessary ref safety error reported for deconstruction #64448
    17.4 P4
  • ITypeSymbol AllInterfaces not reporting code generated Interfaces in some cases #64447
  • incorrect error CS1525 when CS1026 is expected #64440
  • Intermittent compiler error `error CS1617: Invalid option '11.0' for /langversion.` using Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset #64437
  • Empty parameter name reported in error "missing required parameter" #64436

Closed

  • InvalidOperationException from AbstractMoveStaticMembersRefactoringProvider.ComputeRefactoringsAsync #64012
    17.4 P4
  • Stack overflow during project build #64453
  • [LSP] Add back NFW reporting for non-mutating requests. #64444
    17.5 P1
  • CodeLens reports method references for unselected targets #64422

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't NFW for expected exceptions that IL Spy throws #64455
    Area-IDE
  • Fix out of bounds error when doing speculative operations #64454
    Area-IDE
  • Enable CodeQL on official builds #64450
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve CLaSP doc comments #64446
    Area-IDE
  • Update help link URI for code style diagnostics #64438
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64389
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Listen to build manager events to know when build is complete #64366
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix integration tests #64452
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update Microsoft.VisualStudio.Cache to 17.3.26-alpha #64442
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update to use new internal API #64449
    Area-IDE
  • Log errors for Non-mutating requests #64445
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Insert release/dev17.4 to rel/d17.4 #64451
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64458
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64457
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64456
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make IPreviewService async, or synchronous with threading requirements #63661
    Area-IDE
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE
  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not report a secondary NFW exception after already reporting one earlier. #64412
    Area-IDE
  • Add tests to verify bug is fixed #64408
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Add support for implementation edges in our LSIF indexer #64263
    Area-IDE
  • Add symbol key tests #64420
    Area-IDE
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.5 P1
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, 17.5 P1
  • Update ref `foreach` tests #64276
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Assert unnecessary analyzers derive from AbstractBuiltInUnnecessaryCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62944
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix "Build Only" diagnostics content in error list #58409
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Add instrumentation to investigate flakiness in `ConstantFolding_01` #64404
    Test, Flaky

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issues hit with BuildFromSource.md doc #44346
  • Auto CSRF token triggers a warning in the HTML validator #44341
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, updates #44339
  • does Blazor support Multi Page Applications (MPA)? #44338
  • Empty Blazor WebAssembly template should have a <title> in index.html #44335
  • ASP.NET core hybrid solution for SPA or PWA apps #44331
  • Server Variables and Request Headers mutually exclusive in ASP.NET Core+ #44330
  • (string[])Request.Headers["NonExistentHeader"] is null while (IEnumerable<string>)Request.Headers["NonExistentHeader"] is not #44325
    Backlog
  • GenerateWatchList fails in .NET 7.0 rc1 #44324
  • ASP.Net Core 6 integration tests with WebApplicationFactory<TStartup>: How to pass program args? #44321
  • [Analyzer] Add route constraint based on parameter type #44320
  • [Analyzer] Unused route parameter detection and fixer #44319
  • [Analyzer] Header dictionary indexer analyzer and fixer #44318
  • WebSockets could be more abstracted on ASP.NET #44317
  • [Analyzer] RequestDelegate return value detection #44316
  • [Analyzer] Route syntax analyzer #44315

Closed

  • Blazor WASM : IServiceProvider Reflection based Property Getter Exception #44301
  • SignalR C++ breaks after writing this #44035
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis always write after read from the cache. #44340
  • BlazorServer doesn't release circuits/component instances after 25mins+forced GC2 #44062
    7.0.0
  • Remove magic string for razor component @page routing #44253
  • Blazor InputNumber Component Basic Validation (ParsingError) does not work in case of int? (nullable int/decimal/...) #40131
    7.0.0
  • Hosted Blazor wasm Individual Authorization issue inside docker container #44322
  • Provide a custom exception for throwing when trying to do things that require the client to be connected #9010
    Backlog
  • SecurityTokenInvalidAudienceException: IDX10206: Unable to validate audience. The 'audiences' parameter is empty. Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.Validators.ValidateAudience(IEnumerable<string> audiences, SecurityToken securityToken, TokenValidationParameters validationParameters) #44240
  • IIS In Process aspnetcore process failing to start under load #41770
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Identity UserManager.AddToRoleAsync is querying the role with normalized name instead of the name column #43912
    8.0-preview1
  • JavaScript to C# argument passing achieves a whopping 235 kb/s of throughput #44088
  • TR @onclick only after tabbed #44112
  • Blazor Css Sandboxing Error with current VS version 17.3.4 #44149

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Backport 'Make title prerendering not interfere with svg titles' #44343
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Prototype Requirement attribute #44342
    area-security

Merged

  • Update SDK #44344
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor] Fix linking issues #44260
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 7.0.0
  • Use string.StartsWith(char) and string.EndsWith(char) where applicable #44310
    Perf, area-mvc, area-runtime, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Replace -latest docker tags with new schema #44337
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add <title> to empty wasm template index.html #44334
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 7.0.0
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `eb74422` to `9bd1b05` #44328
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `63907e1` to `93f08be` #44327
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Optimize some string.Substring usages #44313
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add code cleanup rules (+perf) #44269
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44309
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2010258 #43956
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Operation is not supported on this platform. when using HttpClient.send on ios and android #10470
  • Android, iOS: CheckBox colors not set correctly using VisualStateManager #10469
  • Flyout is not refreshing when item visibility is changed #10468
  • Secondary ButtonMask odd behaviour #10464
  • Button Horizontal and Vertical TextAlignment #10463
  • [WinUI] Unfocused event of Entry is not fired after navigating back to the page that contains it #10459
    Backlog
  • RadioButton's FontIcon #10454

Closed

  • SwipeView custom items are not rendering #6018
    .NET 7 Planning
  • XA1018 Specified AndroidManifest file does not exist after dotnet workload update #10191
  • FilePicker Android mime-type for gpx files not working #10449
  • Native iOS applications not running #10462
  • Make RegisterRoute a default #10429
  • error in start build not working show sdk error #10439
  • A DateTime.ToString with CultureInfo("nb-NO") gives the wrong datetime string output on iOS #10441
  • Incorrect instruction how to get version in bug report #10447
  • Moving the cursor in an Entry field causes crash in iOS 16 #10427
  • Development Guide not clear on required XCode Version #10444

PullRequests

Created

  • Add inline code documentation guidelines #10465
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.2.0 to 4.3.1 #10461
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.3.0 to 4.3.1 #10460
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix crash relaunching App from sharing item #10457
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖
  • [Windows] Fix crash in WebView updating the Source two times in a row #10456
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

Merged

  • [Android] Measure SwipeItem content before layout #10467
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖
  • Update .NET MAUI find version command in bug template #10466
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10437
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Add `UserAgent` property to `WebView` control. #10413
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview
  • Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨
  • [Android] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer for Android #10352
    area/gestures
  • Add min width/height to template styles of select controls #10425
    area/a11y
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
